ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“It sure is raining hard.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Cloud}
“Hey, how are you doing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“I wouldn't know…”{PAUSE}“I've never had motion sickness,”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“They gave me some new Materia.”{PAUSE}“I can't wait to use it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Cloud}
“You going to brief us
about this mission?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Cloud}
“I joined SOLDIER
so I could be like you.”{PAUSE}“But by the time I made First Class,
The war was already over.”{PAUSE}“My big hopes of becoming a hero
like you ended with the war.”{PAUSE}“That's why I always sign up
whenever there's a big mission.
Kind of a way to prove myself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Cloud}
“Say, how do you feel,
MISTER Sephiroth?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Sephiroth
“…Just like a kid.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Sephiroth
“…This isn't a typical
mission.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Sephiroth
“Why do you say that?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // Sephiroth
“…I thought you wanted
a briefing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // Sephiroth
“Our mission is to investigate
an old Mako reactor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Sephiroth
“There have been reports of
it malfunctioning,
and producing brutal creatures.”{PAUSE}“First, we will dispose of those
creatures.
Then, we'll locate the problem
and neutralize it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Sephiroth
“The Mako reactor at Nibelheim.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // Sephiroth
“That would be our monster…”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // “Sir…s, something strange
just crashed into our truck!”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“Not in SOLDIER, just a common grunt.”

{Cloud}
“I…never made it as a member of SOLDIER.”

{Cloud}
“I even left my hometown telling everyone
I was going to join, but…”

{Cloud}
“I was so embarrassed…
I didn't want to see anybody…”

Zack
“Hey {Cloud}.
If you're feeling sick,
why don't you take that mask off?”

“…It's the Planet.
It takes years to make.”

{Cloud}
“I wouldn't know…”{PAUSE}“I've never had motion sickness,”

{Cloud}
“They gave me some new Materia.”{PAUSE}“I can't wait to use it.”

{Cloud}
“You going to brief us
about this mission?”

{Cloud}
“I joined SOLDIER
so I could be like you.”{PAUSE}“But by the time I made First Class,
The war was already over.”{PAUSE}“My big hopes of becoming a hero
like you ended with the war.”{PAUSE}“That's why I always sign up
whenever there's a big mission.
Kind of a way to prove myself.”

{Cloud}
“Say, how do you feel,
MISTER Sephiroth?”

Sephiroth
“…I thought you wanted
a briefing?”

Sephiroth
“Our mission is to investigate
an old Mako reactor.”

Sephiroth
“There have been reports of
it malfunctioning,
and producing brutal creatures.”{PAUSE}“First, we will dispose of those
creatures.
Then, we'll locate the problem
and neutralize it.”

“Sir…s, something strange
just crashed into our truck!”

Sephiroth
“Come on, let's go to work.”
